content: I want to load a set pre-existing site configuration to run a test. Can I load a database and populate config before the test runs?
I'm only able to fiddle with existing tests and scrape my way through, so not a test guru by any means ...but I have the impression that this may be possible by setting up a profile.

@docwilmot perhaps you can follow the trails from https://www.drupal.org/project/drupal/issues/2447573 and/or http://patshaughnessy.net/2009/1/16/using-a-test-database-with-drupal-unit-tests (they seem relevant to me) and get somewhere? :shrug:
